title: Quinoxaline-based nonfullerene acceptors with powerful core-functionalization ability enabling efficient solar energy utilization
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01474J, Perspective
Kerui Liu, Yuanyuan Jiang, Feng Liu, Xiaozhang Zhu
Quinoxaline-based nonfullerene acceptors show highly tunable photoelectric properties and superior performance for sunlight utilization enabled by their powerful core-functionalization ability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
